sect2.title: Overview
sect2.para: QMI is QualComm's msg exchange format. It is widely used in MSM8960 platform, as AP/BP in one-single chipset.
We can simply consider it as a MUX used in Hubble platform, or a Language talking to BP.
So, in MSM8960, there's no MUX channels, and AT commands I/O between AP/BP. All AP/BP data I/O is via QMI channel.
The whole QMI msg is organized by header and vary-length TLV data payload.
